Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="Command"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Function" Type="System.String" Value="Annual.UpdateMsisdnAnnualContractBasePenaltyPrice"/> <Attribute Name="Msisdn" Type="System.String" Value="##msisdn##"/> <Attribute Name="DateFrom" Type="System.DateTime" Value="##datetime##"/> </Attributes> <DataTable Name="Input"> <Columns> <Column Name="CampaignId" Type="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="BasePenaltyPrice" Type="System.Decimal"/> </Columns> <Rows>##Rows##</Rows> </DataTable> </DataSet>
